-- Get pending requisitions with all BIND mapping data
WITH bind_data AS (
  SELECT
    r.id as requisition_id,
    r.internal_folio,
    r.company_id,
    r.project_id,
    r.total_amount,
    r.comments,
    r.approved_at,
    r.approved_by,
    r.business_status,
    r.integration_status,
    r.bind_sync_attempts,
    r.items as requisition_items,
    -- Project info
    p.name as project_name,
    p.description as project_location,
    -- Company info
    c.name as company_name,
    c.bind_location_id,
    c.bind_price_list_id,
    -- Approver info (email viene de auth.users)
    pr.full_name as approver_name,
    au.email as approver_email,
    -- BIND Mappings usando funciones
    public.get_bind_client_id(r.company_id) as bind_client_id,
    public.get_bind_branch_id(r.project_id) as bind_branch_id,
    public.get_bind_warehouse_id(r.project_id) as bind_warehouse_id
  FROM requisitions r
  LEFT JOIN projects p ON p.id = r.project_id
  LEFT JOIN companies c ON c.id = r.company_id
  LEFT JOIN profiles pr ON pr.id = r.approved_by
  LEFT JOIN auth.users au ON au.id = r.approved_by
  WHERE
    r.business_status = 'approved'
    AND r.integration_status = 'pending_sync'
    AND r.bind_synced_at IS NULL
    AND r.bind_sync_attempts < 3
  ORDER BY r.approved_at ASC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT * FROM bind_data;

UPDATE requisitions
SET
  integration_status = 'synced',
  bind_order_id = '{{ $('GET Order Details').item.json.ID }}',
  bind_folio = '{{ $('GET Order Details').item.json.Number }}',
  bind_status = 'StatusID: {{ $('GET Order Details').item.json.StatusID }}',
  bind_synced_at = NOW(),
  bind_error_message = NULL,
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $('Capture Order ID').item.json.requisition_id }}';

INSERT INTO bind_sync_logs (
  company_id,
  sync_type,
  entity_type,
  entity_id,
  bind_id,
  status,
  request_payload,
  response_payload,
  synced_at
) VALUES (
  '{{ $('Capture Order ID').item.json.company_id }}',
  'requisition',
  'requisition',
  '{{ $('Capture Order ID').item.json.requisition_id }}',
  '{{ $('GET Order Details').item.json.ID }}',
  'success',
  '{{ JSON.stringify($('Transform to BIND Format').item.json.bind_payload) }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ JSON.stringify($('GET Order Details').item.json) }}'::jsonb,
  NOW()
);

UPDATE requisitions
SET
  integration_status = 'sync_failed',
  bind_error_message = '{{ $json.error_message || $json.message || "Unknown error" }}',
  bind_sync_attempts = bind_sync_attempts + 1,
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $('Capture Order ID').item.json.requisition_id }}';

INSERT INTO bind_sync_logs (
  company_id,
  sync_type,
  entity_type,
  entity_id,
  status,
  request_payload,
  error_message,
  synced_at
) VALUES (
  '{{ $('Capture Order ID').item.json.company_id }}',
  'requisition',
  'requisition',
  '{{ $('Capture Order ID').item.json.requisition_id }}',
  'failed',
  '{{ JSON.stringify($('Transform to BIND Format').item.json.bind_payload) }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ $json.error_message || $json.message || "Unknown error" }}',
  NOW()
);
